innhold.avsnitt: We will inform you during the application process if we need any documents from you.
In order to be able to calculate your benefit, we need information about your income.
If you have had earned income or are working

liste.punkt: You must ask your employer to submit digital income report to NAV. The earliest the income report can be submitted is four weeks before the start of the parental benefit period.
If you are receiving money from NAV, you do not need to submit documentation of this income.

innhold.avsnitt: If you are self-employed or freelance, you do not need to submit any documentation. We gather the information we need from public records and will contact you if we need more information.
Confirmation of expected date of delivery
If you are permanently employed by an employer, you do not need to send NAV confirmation of your expected date of delivery.
You must submit confirmation of your expected date of delivery if

liste.punkt: you are not permanently employed by an employer

innhold.avsnitt: You get confirmation of your expected date of delivery from your midwife or doctor. This cannot be issued before the 26th week of pregnancy.
If the child is born outside Norway and is not registered in the National Registry, you must attach the child’s birth certificate.
If you are permanently employed by an employer, you do not need to send NAV a confirmation of your caesarean section.
You must submit a confirmation of your caesarean section if:

liste.punkt: you are not permanently employed by an employer

innhold.avsnitt: The father or co-mother must have the shared period or parental benefit

You must provide documentation of the mother’s activity requirement if you are staying at home during the shared period or receiving parental benefit. If only you are entitled to parental benefit, you must also provide documentation of the mother’s activity requirement, if you are going to postpone your parental benefit period.
Documentation that must be enclosed with an application for a lump-sum grant

liste.punkt: If you are applying before the child has been born, we need confirmation of your expected date of delivery from a midwife or your doctor. It must show that you are in at least the 26th week of pregnancy.
Upload the confirmation of your expected date of delivery when you fill out and submit the application online.
In connection with adoption, you must submit documentation of the date of assumption of care.
